name: Zari Eyes Long-Lasting Crease-Proof Cream Eyeshadow
about: What it is: A highly pigmented and long-lasting cream-to-powder eyeshadow with a crease-proof formula that won't budge...Highlighted Ingredients: - Vitamin E: Moisturizes and nourishes skin..- Chamomile: Helps to soothe and calm skin..- Aloe Vera: Naturally rich in moisturizing properties...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This creamy formula dries down quickly and comfortably upon application with no fading or fallout throughout the day. It is enriched with moisturizing ingredients to help the product glide on effortlessly and achieve a bold, high-pigment payoff that is long-lasting, transfer-resistant, and smooth.......Allure
ingredients: Isododecane, Aluminum Calcium Sodium Silicate, Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Tribehenin, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Synthetic Beeswax, Propylene Carbonate, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice Powder*, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Extract, Glycerin, Jojoba Esters, Isopropyl Jojobate, Jojoba Alcohol, Tin Oxide, Silica, Maltodextrin, Water (Aqua) (Eau), Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, 77499) * Certified organic ingredient/Ingredient certifie biologique.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Using your fingertip, tap the top of the eyeshadow to pick up product..-Apply eyeshadow onto lid and blend into your eyelid crease, moving backward and forward until color is smooth and even..-For a soft and natural look, tap and blend one layer onto lids..-For a bold and pigmented look, apply a few layers until desired depth of color is reached.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited for these that I got 6 colours! But they have been such a disappointment, and reminded me why I buy longer established if pricier products when I can. This is ostensibly an indian owned brand and I thought as such teh colours would be better on my skin but geenrally they are too light and don't really show. For them to show, I have to really layer, but then there is a risk of cracking and peeling unlike when they are more sheer. I end up using them as abase colour and then layering a powder on top. But the real issue is, the glass they are in- Almost all of my cosmetics are in glass, so this shouldn't be odd. The day i got this, it gently slid down my sink (weird) and when it got to the bottom, it was so heavy that it shattered my sink as well as itself. So I got a great deal on the makeup, but now I have to pay over 400$ to replace a sink instead of getting my kids christmas presents and the makeup is unusable as the glass is shattered. All into the trash o the first day, and no bathroom sink and all from sliding into it. I have had other products in glass and never this issue. I just sadly cannot recomment.  I do have love for the eyeliner, in a plastic casing!

reviews.review_text: I am blown away by this shadow! I was gifted the shade bronze brocade and I tested it out recently by doing an all-day wear test during a very hot and humid Labor Day weekend. You can see in my 2 photos with different lighting that it almost looks like a neutral on me in direct bright light, but in more natural light without tons of sunlight pouring it, you can really see the depth of the bronzey color and a bit of the silver sparkles peek through. It works great for an eyeshadow look that can transition from day to night. I definitely recommend trying it out!

reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow. Itu2019s a different consistency and formula than Iu2019ve ever seen before personally, but it works so well. reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Kulfi Beauty.  This eyeshadow is soo pretty. Great color payoff stays wet for a bit so you have time to work with it. It has a great shimmer, I really love using this and excited to try some of the other colors.

reviews.review_title: Matched the description. Buildable and smooth!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an eye shadow that is one of the most accurate when compared to product description. I was impressed with the effortless glide, smudge proof, crease proof and very buildable formula. As pictured, one swipe is very sheer but next to it is 3 swipes, a vibrant bold color with a nice metallic finish. I like how this comes in a pot and a little goes a long way just a dab to start and then a light dab back into the pot to build. This formula performed well and exceeded expectations. I can see this amount of shadow in the pot lasting me a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg, I absolutely love this eye shadow!! I have the Sitara Sparkle and the color is so so beautiful, well pigment and it does not crease!! Itu2019s literally just perfect for me since I always use more of like a pink-ish tone all the time.  Gifted by Kulfi Beauty

I recommend this to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Kulfi Beauty. This is a really beautiful eyeshadow. It has a mousse/whipped texture that blends out really easily. This also wears pretty well for such a moisturizing formula. Bronze brocade is a really pretty warm bronze with flecks of silver shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has a very bouncy putty texture, similar to the Charlotte Tilbury ones. It can be sheered out as a colorful wash of shimmer, or built up a little to a more intense color. I have very textured eyelids so creasing is inevitable, but this one held up longer than I expected. Gifted by Kulfi Beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to have this new product gifted by Kulfi Beauty. Iu2019ve been dying to try this brand for the past several months and Iu2019m so glad I finally have now. This is a true cream eyeshadow, and even though itu2019s a very creamy consistency it sets down beautifully and can be worn more sheer or more opaque for extra shine. I have not experienced any creating at all with this cream shadow, which is always the biggest issue I face with cream eyeshadows. I also am obsessed with this shade on my blue eyes, it really makes them pop! Iu2019m definitely impressed with this product and canu2019t wait to try more from Kulfi in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Kulfi Beauty Zari Eyes Eyeshadow gifted by Kulfi Beauty in the shade Auburn Aura (cranberry rose)! This color is absolutely stunning on the eyes! It has great color payoff. Iu2019ve applied the product using both an eyeshadow brush or just my fingers and it works beautifully either way and provides great pigment. You can also use it as a topper after applying an eyeshadow base or neutral color. It dries down to a comfortable semi-matte color. Definitely recommend and I plan to try out other colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Kulfi Beauty. This bronze shade was absolutely gorgeous however it did crease in about an hour of wearing ( I have very oil lids) but regardless, if your product is advertised as a long lasting product that won't budge, it should work on all lids

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin

The color definitely pops and is very vibrant.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great highly pigmented cream eyeshadow. It lasts for the whole day and I totally love its non-creasing formula. It's super easy to apply. I love the color options and the bold look. gifted by Kulfi Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow is stunning! It is super pigmented and is super easy to blend. I love the color options and how it delivers the perfect pop of color. It is super easy to use and creates a beautiful eye look with.complimentary from Kulfi Beauty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Zari eyes eyeshadow pot complimentary from Kulfi beauty and Iu2019ve been using it for the past week or so, I really like how pigmented it is and the gold glitter it has, itu2019s perfect for a one and some eyeshadow look and has a very good lasting power, I would definitely recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Kulfi Beauty before it released, and thus was able to travel with this and see how it performs on the go.  I was pleasantly surprised with how well it held up in travel. The design is sturdy and the lid doesn't allow air in. I tried applying it several different ways and ultimately prefer the look obtained with fingers. One note is that you want to make sure to pick up just the tiniest amount of product and build from there. If you grab too much, you'll end up pushing too much product into the corner of the eyes (where it may crease/fall onto your cheeks). Just use a light touch and build if you want more.  I also tried it with a brush and that gives a barely-there appearance. I liked it in some ways, but I do like the color and thus prefer the effect of a finger application.  It wears very well through the day. Surprisingly well, in fact. It won't smudge or crease if you apply it as described above, and it looks great at the end of the day.  Overall, I am very pleased!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream shadow is absolutely stunning. I love the Charlotte Tilbury one, but this one is right up there.  The shadow is pigmented, lasts long and doesnu2019t crease. I really hope they come out with additional shades!

reviews.review_title: Pretty and Turns into a powder

Once dry, there was minimal creasing on my hooded eyelids, even without primer at the end of the day (8+ hours). It had just enough shimmer with some micro glitter so I can wear for work, and good for minimal makeup looks. A banger from Kulfi! Hope they come out with more shades.
